Text:
here are three parts

Part One

1. Open uTorrent
2. Click Options
3. Click Preferences
4. Click Advanced
5. Make sure ipfilter.enable = true
If ipfilter.enable was false you will have to restart uTorrent after changing it to true.

Part Two

1. Insert the file to C:\Users\username\AppData\Roaming\utorrent.

Part Three

1. Open uTorrent
2. Click on the tab "Peers"
3. Right click anywhere within the Peers tab area.
4. Select "Reload IPFilter"
5. Click on the "Logger" tab to see that the ipfilter is loaded

Hope that helps and please post if you run into any more challenges.

Cheers

RC
that is info on how to do it in vista

oh and then you have to restart utorrent or click on reload ip filter
Is reload ip filter the same as reset?
its in the second way of starting ipfilter with out restarting torrents with the setting to true and then to false and then to true again part
